title: Stylish China Oceanfront Beihai Retreat Overlooking Silver Beach
description: Directly overlooking the shining silver sands of one of China’s most stunning shorelines, Crowne Plaza Beihai Silver Beach, an IHG Hotel, offers guests the perfect base to discover the region’s countless charms. After days spent diving for pearls or admiring extraordinary sunsets, enjoy local classics at De Feng Lou Chinese Restaurant, make a splash in the resort’s mirage-like swimming pool or savour magnificent seaside views and perfect steaks and fine spirits at B@21 Steak House.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Beihai Silver Beach, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.8 Yintan Fourth Road, Yinhai District., Beihai, 536000 Guangxi, Mainland China
